title: 219 - Mini Desk Life Maraldo
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with a FULL BARN as the boys dive right Into the latest movie and television consumption as Zito is trying to convince everyone “Morbius” wasn’t as bad as advertised. The boys then jump right into the Pod FOD which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Todays FOD includes a look into the Equalizer 3, New Barbie preview, one man taking on a gator and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
